Armored Blow 1.effect: Grants Def+2 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Armored Blow 2.effect: Grants Def+4 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Armored Blow 3.effect: Grants Def+6 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Close Counter.effect: Enables unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

Close Def 1.effect: If unit is attacked by foe using sword, axe, lance, or dragonstone, unit receives Def/Res+2 during combat.

Close Def 2.effect: If unit is attacked by foe using sword, axe, lance, or dragonstone, unit receives Def/Res+4 during combat.

Close Def 3.effect: If unit is attacked by foe using sword, axe, lance, or dragonstone, unit receives Def/Res+6 during combat.

Darting Blow 1.effect: Grants Spd+2 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Darting Blow 2.effect: Grants Spd+4 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Darting Blow 3.effect: Grants Spd+6 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Death Blow 1.effect: Grants Atk+2 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Death Blow 2.effect: Grants Atk+4 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Death Blow 3.effect: Grants Atk+6 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Defiant Atk 1.effect: Grants Atk +3 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Defiant Atk 2.effect: Grants Atk +5 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Defiant Atk 3.effect: Grants Atk +7 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Defiant Def 1.effect: Grants Def +3 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Defiant Def 2.effect: Grants Def +5 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Defiant Def 3.effect: Grants Def +7 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Defiant Res 1.effect: Grants Res+3 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Defiant Res 2.effect: Grants Res+5 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Defiant Res 3.effect: Grants Res+7 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Defiant Spd 1.effect: Grants Spd +3 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Defiant Spd 2.effect: Grants Spd +5 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Defiant Spd 3.effect: Grants Spd +7 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Distant Counter.effect: Enables unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

Distant Def 1.effect: If unit is attacked by foe using bow, daggers, magic, or staff, unit receives Def/Res+2 during combat.

Distant Def 2.effect: If unit is attacked by foe using bow, daggers, magic, or staff, unit receives Def/Res+4 during combat.

Distant Def 3.effect: If unit is attacked by foe using bow, daggers, magic, or staff, unit receives Def/Res+6 during combat.

Earth Boost 1.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Def+2 during combat.

Earth Boost 2.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Def+4 during combat.

Earth Boost 3.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Def+6 during combat.

Fire Boost 1.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Atk+2 during combat.

Fire Boost 2.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Atk+4 during combat.

Fire Boost 3.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Atk+6 during combat.

Fury 1.effect: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+1. Unit takes 2 damage after combat.

Fury 2.effect: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. Unit takes 4 damage after combat.

Fury 3.effect: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. Unit takes 6 damage after combat.

Heavy Blade 1.effect: If unit's Atk - foe's Atk ≥ 5, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

Heavy Blade 2.effect: If unit's Atk - foe's Atk ≥ 3, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

Heavy Blade 3.effect: If unit's Atk - foe's Atk ≥ 1, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

Mirror Strike 1.effect: Grants Atk/Res+2 during combat if unit initiates attack.

Mirror Strike 2.effect: Grants Atk/Res+4 during combat if unit initiates attack.

Sturdy Blow 1.effect: If unit initiates combat, unit granted Atk/Def+2 during battle.

Sturdy Blow 2.effect: If unit initiates combat, unit granted Atk/Def+4 during battle.

Swift Sparrow 1.effect: If unit initiates combat, unit granted Atk/Spd+2 during battle.

Swift Sparrow 2.effect: If unit initiates combat, unit granted Atk/Spd+4 during battle.

Triangle Adept 1.effect: Gives Atk+10% if weapon-triangle advantage, Atk-10% if disadvantage.

Triangle Adept 2.effect: Gives Atk+15% if weapon-triangle advantage, Atk-15% if disadvantage.

Triangle Adept 3.effect: Gives Atk+20% if weapon-triangle advantage, Atk-20% if disadvantage.

Warding Blow 1.effect: Grants Res+2 during combat if unit initiates attack.

Warding Blow 2.effect: Grants Res+4 during combat if unit initiates attack.

Warding Blow 3.effect: Grants Res+6 during combat if unit initiates attack.

Water Boost 1.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Res+2 during combat.

Water Boost 2.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Res+4 during combat.

Water Boost 3.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Res+6 during combat.

Wind Boost 1.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Spd+2 during combat.

Wind Boost 2.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Spd+4 during combat.

Wind Boost 3.effect: If Unit has at least 3 more HP than enemy at the start of combat, unit receives Spd+6 during combat.

Axebreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against an axe user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Axebreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against an axe user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Axebreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against an axe user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

B Tomebreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a blue tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

B Tomebreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a blue tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

B Tomebreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a blue tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Bowbreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Bowbreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Bowbreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Brash Assault 1.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup when at HP ≤ 30% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Brash Assault 2.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup when at HP ≤ 40% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Brash Assault 3.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup when at HP ≤ 50% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Cancel Affinity 1.effect: Any weapon triangle affinity granted by unit's skills is negated. Also negates any weapon triangle affinity granted by foe's skills.

Cancel Affinity 2.effect: Any weapon triangle affinity granted by unit's skills is negated. If affinity disadvantage exists, weapon triangle affinity granted by foe's skills is negated.

Cancel Affinity 3.effect: Any weapon triangle affinity granted by unit's skills is negated. If affinity disadvantage exists, weapon triangle affinity granted by foe's skills is reversed.

Daggerbreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Daggerbreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Daggerbreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Dazzling Staff 1.effect: If unit has 100% HP at the start of combat, the enemy cannot counterattack.

Dazzling Staff 2.effect: If unit has ≥ 50% HP at the start of combat, the enemy cannot counterattack.

Desperation 1.effect: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 25%, followup attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Desperation 2.effect: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 50%, followup attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Desperation 3.effect: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 75%, followup attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Drag Back.effect: If unit initiates attack, the unit moves 1 space away after combat. Foe moves into unit's previous space.

Escape Route 1.effect: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 30% to warp adjacent to any ally.

Escape Route 2.effect: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 40% to warp adjacent to any ally.

Escape Route 3.effect: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 50% to warp adjacent to any ally.

G Tomebreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

G Tomebreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

G Tomebreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Guard 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 100% at start of combat, enemy is inflicted with Special cooldown charge -1. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

Guard 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% at start of combat, enemy is inflicted with Special cooldown charge -1. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

Guard 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 80% at start of combat, enemy is inflicted with Special cooldown charge -1. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

Hit and Run.effect: If unit initiates attack, unit advances 1 space after battle.

Knock Back.effect: If unit initiates attack, foe is moved 1 space away after combat.

Lancebreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Lancebreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Lancebreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Live for Bounty.effect: If unit survives, get 1.5x normal crystals from a Training Tower map. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Live for Honor.effect: If unit survives, get 1.5x normal badges from a Training Tower map. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Live to Serve 1.effect: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers 50% of the HP restored.

Live to Serve 2.effect: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers 75% of the HP restored.

Live to Serve 3.effect: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers the same amount.

Lunge.effect: If unit initiates attack, after combat, unit and targeted foe swap places.

Obstruct 1.effect: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 90%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Obstruct 2.effect: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 70%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Obstruct 3.effect: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 50%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Pass 1.effect: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 75%.

Pass 2.effect: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 50%.

Pass 3.effect: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 25%.

Poison Strike 1.effect: Inflicts 4 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Poison Strike 2.effect: Inflicts 7 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Poison Strike 3.effect: Inflicts 10 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Quick Riposte 1.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup attack if attacked at HP ≥ 90%.

Quick Riposte 2.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup attack if attacked at HP ≥ 80%.

Quick Riposte 3.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup attack if attacked at HP ≥ 70%.

R Tomebreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

R Tomebreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

R Tomebreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Renewal 1.effect: At the start of every fourth turn, restores 10 HP.

Renewal 2.effect: At the start of every third turn, restores 10 HP.

Renewal 3.effect: At the start of every second turn, restores 10 HP.

Seal Atk 1.effect: After combat, foe suffers Atk-3 through its next action.

Seal Atk 2.effect: After combat, foe suffers Atk-5 through its next action.

Seal Atk 3.effect: After combat, foe suffers Atk-7 through its next action.

Seal Atk/Spd 1.effect: After combat, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe through its next action.

Seal Atk/Spd 2.effect: After combat, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foe through its next action.

Seal Def 1.effect: After combat, foe suffers Def-3 through its next action.

Seal Def 2.effect: After combat, foe suffers Def-5 through its next action.

Seal Def 3.effect: After combat, foe suffers Def-7 through its next action.

Seal Res 1.effect: After combat, foe suffers Res-3 through its next action.

Seal Res 2.effect: After combat, foe suffers Res-5 through its next action.

Seal Res 3.effect: After combat, foe suffers Res-7 through its next action.

Seal Spd 1.effect: After combat, foe suffers Spd-3 through its next action.

Seal Spd 2.effect: After combat, foe suffers Spd-5 through its next action.

Seal Spd 3.effect: After combat, foe suffers Spd-7 through its next action.

Shield Pulse 1.effect: If unit's Special triggers based on a foe's attack, Special cooldown count-2 at start of turn 1. Unit takes 5 less damage when Special triggers.

Shield Pulse 2.effect: If unit's Special triggers based on a foe's attack, Special cooldown count-2 at start of turn 1. Unit takes 5 less damage when Special triggers.

Shield Pulse 3.effect: If unit's Special triggers based on a foe's attack, Special cooldown count-2 at start of turn 1. Unit takes 5 less damage when Special triggers.

Swordbreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Swordbreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Swordbreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Vantage 1.effect: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 25%.

Vantage 2.effect: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 50%.

Vantage 3.effect: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 75%.

Wary Fighter 1.effect: Prevents followup attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 90%.

Wary Fighter 2.effect: Prevents followup attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 70%.

Wary Fighter 3.effect: Prevents followup attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 50%.

Watersweep 1.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with magic, staff, or dragonstone, if unit's Spd - foe's Spd ≥ 5, foe can't counterattack.

Watersweep 2.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with magic, staff, or dragonstone, if unit's Spd - foe's Spd ≥ 3, foe can't counterattack.

Watersweep 3.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with magic, staff, or dragonstone, if unit's Spd - foe's Spd ≥ 1, foe can't counterattack.

Windsweep 1.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with sword, lance, axe, bow, or dagger, if unit's Spd - foe's Spd ≥ 5, foe can't counterattack.

Windsweep 2.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with sword, lance, axe, bow, or dagger, if unit's Spd - foe's Spd ≥ 3, foe can't counterattack.

Windsweep 3.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with sword, lance, axe, bow, or dagger, if unit's Spd - foe's Spd ≥ 1, foe can't counterattack.

Wings of Mercy 1.effect: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 30%.

Wings of Mercy 2.effect: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 40%.

Wings of Mercy 3.effect: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 50%.

Wrathful Staff 1.effect: If unit has 100% HP at the start of combat, damage from their staff will be calculated the same as other weapons.

Wrathful Staff 2.effect: If unit has ≥ 50% HP at the start of combat, damage from their staff will be calculated the same as other weapons.

Wrathful Staff 3.effect: Damage from unit's staff will be calculated the same as other weapons.

Atk Ploy 1.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Atk-3 until the end of foe's next action.

Atk Ploy 2.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Atk-4 until the end of foe's next action.

Atk Ploy 3.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Atk-5 until the end of foe's next action.

Axe Experience 1.effect: If unit survives and uses an axe, unit gets 1.5x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Axe Experience 2.effect: If unit survives, all axe users on team get 1.5x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Axe Experience 3.effect: If unit survives, all axe users on team get 2x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Axe Valor 1.effect: If unit survives and uses an axe, unit gets 1.5x SP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Axe Valor 2.effect: If unit survives, all axe users on team get 1.5x SP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Axe Valor 3.effect: If unit survives, all axe users on team get 2x SP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Bow Experience 1.effect: If unit survives and uses a bow, unit gets 1.5x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Bow Experience 2.effect: If unit survives, all bow users on team get 1.5x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Bow Experience 3.effect: If unit survives, all bow users on team get 2x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

B Tome Exp. 1.effect: If unit survives and uses a blue tome, unit gets 1.5x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

B Tome Exp. 2.effect: If unit survives, all blue tome users on team get 1.5x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

B Tome Exp. 3.effect: If unit survives, all blue tome users on team get 2x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Breath of Life 1.effect: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 3 HP after combat.

Breath of Life 2.effect: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 5 HP after combat.

Breath of Life 3.effect: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 7 HP after combat.

Def Ploy 1.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Def-3 until the end of foe's next action.

Def Ploy 2.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Def-4 until the end of foe's next action.

Def Ploy 3.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Def-5 until the end of foe's next action.

Drive Atk 1.effect: Grants allies within 2 spaces Atk+2 during combat.

Drive Atk 2.effect: Grants allies within 2 spaces Atk+3 during combat.

Drive Def 1.effect: Grants allies within 2 spaces Def+2 during combat.

Drive Def 2.effect: Grants allies within 2 spaces Def+3 during combat.

Fortify Armor.effect: Grants adjacent armor allies Def/Res+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Fortify Cavalry.effect: Grants adjacent cavalry allies Def/Res+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Fortify Def 1.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Fortify Def 2.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Fortify Def 3.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Fortify Dragons.effect: Grants adjacent dragon allies Def/Res+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Fortify Fliers.effect: Grants adjacent flying allies Def/Res+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Fortify Res 1.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Fortify Res 2.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Fortify Res 3.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Goad Armor.effect: Grants armored allies within 2 spaces Spd/Atk+4 during combat.

Goad Cavalry.effect: Grants cavalry allies within 2 spaces Spd/Atk+4 during combat.

Goad Fliers.effect: Grants flying allies within 2 spaces Spd/Atk+4 during combat.

Hone Armor.effect: Grants adjacent armored allies Atk/Spd+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Hone Atk 1.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Hone Atk 2.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Hone Atk 3.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Hone Cavalry.effect: Grants adjacent cavalry allies Atk/Spd+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Hone Fliers.effect: Grants adjacent flying allies Atk/Spd+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Hone Spd 1.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Hone Spd 2.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Hone Spd 3.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Lance Valor 1.effect: If unit survives and uses a lance, unit gets 1.5x SP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Lance Valor 2.effect: If unit survives, all lance users on team get 1.5x SP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Lance Valor 3.effect: If unit survives, all lance users on team get 2x SP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Panic Ploy 1.effect: At start of turn, bonuses become penalties on all foes in cardinal directions with HP 5 or more lower than unit through foe's next action.

Panic Ploy 2.effect: At start of turn, bonuses become penalties on all foes in cardinal directions with HP 3 or more lower than unit through foe's next action.

Panic Ploy 3.effect: At start of turn, bonuses become penalties on all foes in cardinal directions with HP 1 or more lower than unit through foe's next action.

Red Ploy 1.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Res-3 until the end of foe's next action.

Res Ploy 2.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Res-4 until the end of foe's next action.

Res Ploy 3.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Res-5 until the end of foe's next action.

Savage Blow 1.effect: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 3 damage after combat.

Savage Blow 2.effect: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 5 damage after combat.

Savage Blow 3.effect: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 7 damage after combat.

Spur Atk 1.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+2 during combat.

Spur Atk 2.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+3 during combat.

Spur Atk 3.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+4 during combat.

Spur Def 1.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+2 during combat.

Spur Def 2.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+3 during combat.

Spur Def 3.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+4 during combat.

Spur Def/Res 1.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def/Res+2 during combat.

Spur Def/Res 2.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def/Res+3 during combat.

Spur Res 1.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+2 during combat.

Spur Res 2.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+3 during combat.

Spur Res 3.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+4 during combat.

Spur Spd 1.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+2 during combat.

Spur Spd 2.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+3 during combat.

Spur Spd 3.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+4 during combat.

Sword Exp. 1.effect: If unit survives and uses a sword, unit gets 1.5x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Sword Exp. 2.effect: If unit survives, all sword users on team get 1.5x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Sword Exp. 3.effect: If unit survives, all sword users on team get 2x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Sword Valor 1.effect: If unit survives and uses a sword, unit gets 1.5x SP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Sword Valor 2.effect: If unit survives, all sword users on team get 1.5x SP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Sword Valor 3.effect: If unit survives, all sword users on team get 2x SP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

Threaten Atk 1.effect: Inflicts Atk-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Threaten Atk 2.effect: Inflicts Atk-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Threaten Atk 3.effect: Inflicts Atk-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Threaten Def 1.effect: Inflicts Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Threaten Def 2.effect: Inflicts Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Threaten Def 3.effect: Inflicts Def-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Threaten Res 1.effect: Inflicts Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Threaten Res 2.effect: Inflicts Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Threaten Res 3.effect: Inflicts Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Threaten Spd 1.effect: Inflicts Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Threaten Spd 2.effect: Inflicts Spd-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Threaten Spd 3.effect: Inflicts Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Ward Armor.effect: Grants armored allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+4 during combat.

Ward Cavalry.effect: Grants cavalry allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+4 during combat.

Ward Fliers.effect: Grants flying allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+4 during combat.
